## v0.11.1.1
- fix js groups edit page

## v0.11.1
- update js dependencies

## v0.11.0
- 2FA with OTP

## v0.10.0
- email with verification

## v0.9.5
- changed default password re (min length)
- change session id on succesful login without loosing info


## v0.9.1
- http header disallowing frame incapsulation

## v0.9.0

- fix to password expiration cycle
- fix to special chars.
- some fixes and stability

## v0.8.4

- password expiration cycle

## v0.8.3

- allow user registration (optional) with default group (optional)
- bug fixes in alembic for including software
- bug fixes in user creation with some password settings

## v0.8.2.1

- can specify individual default-users password
- can run ACL without proper context (only root allowed)

## V0.8.1.8

- bug fix in user login
- bug fix in user permissions

## V0.8.1

- bug fix in user login
- change of user profile page

## V0.8.0

- alembic integration 

## V0.7.2.3.3

- added support for bootstrap 3 & 4 with new parameter: ppss_auth.bootstrapversion. 


## V0.7.2.3.3

- fixed unicode error in python 3

## V0.7.2

- Fixed issue with "ppss_auth.post_login_follow"


## V0.6.1

- Added search functionality
